title: #1589 New York Minute
itunes:title: #1589 New York Minute
description:
Adam opens the show telling Dr. Drew about a film he recently experienced from 2004 featuring one Dr. Drew, 'New York Minute'. They also discuss a recent controversy involving author James Patterson who ended up in hot water for suggesting discrimination against white writes and they analyze his 'apology' tweet and disagree a bit on how they interpret his intentions. Drew also discusses a recent interview he did where he learned some new things about people on the autism spectrum before the conversation turns to their favorite subject of all time: The Love Boat.
